Cassiopeia.name: Cassiopeia
Cassiopeia.title: the Serpent's Embrace
Cassiopeia.lore: Cassiopeia is a terrifying creature - half woman, half snake - whose slightest glance brings death. The youngest daughter of one of Noxus' most influential families, she was once a beautiful and cunning temptress capable of manipulating the hardest heart. Transformed by the venom of an ancient Shuriman tomb guardian, she continues to serve Noxian interests as she always has, just in a more... visceral way.
Cassiopeia.blurb: Cassiopeia is a terrifying creature - half woman, half snake - whose slightest glance brings death. The youngest daughter of one of Noxus' most influential families, she was once a beautiful and cunning temptress capable of manipulating the hardest ...
allytips: Use Twin Fang on poisoned stationary targets like monsters and units stunned by her Petrifying Gaze for maximum damage.
Lead your enemy when targeting with Noxious Blast to ensure the hit.
enemytips: Be wary of Cassiopeia's damage potential with Twin Fang when she has you poisoned.
Turn away from Cassiopeia when she is casting Petrifying Gaze to get slowed instead of stunned.

spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Miasma
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.

spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.description: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed. If the target is killed, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. If the target is Poisoned then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

Killing an enemy with Twin Fang restores its Mana cost plus an additional 3% of Cassiopeia's total Mana.

spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

passive.name: Aspect of the Serpent
passive.description: Cassiopeia gains stacks of Aspect of the Serpent for poisoning enemy champions and killing poisoned units. She then gets bonuses based on the number of these stacks.
